physicalTable.name: SAMP_PRODUCTS_D
physicalTable.description: Products dimension table : Stores product dimension attribute information

physicalColumns.name: Prod_Key
physicalColumns.description: Product Key: Surrogate key of the product dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Type
physicalColumns.description: Type: Stores the product type information as text

physicalColumns.name: Brand
physicalColumns.description: Brand: Stores the product brand information as text

physicalColumns.name: Brand_Key
physicalColumns.description: Brand Key: Stores product brand key as an integer

physicalColumns.name: LOB_Key
physicalColumns.description: LOB Key: Stores product LOB key as an integer

physicalColumns.name: Prod_Dsc
physicalColumns.description: Product Description: Stores the product description information as text

physicalColumns.name: Attribute_1
physicalColumns.description: Attribute 1: Stores product attribute1 information as text

physicalColumns.name: Sequence
physicalColumns.description: Sequence: Stores product sequence as an integer

physicalColumns.name: Attribute_2
physicalColumns.description: Attribute 2: Stores product attribute2 information as text

physicalColumns.name: LOB
physicalColumns.description: LOB: Stores the product LOB information as text

physicalColumns.name: Type_Key
physicalColumns.description: Type Key: Stores product type key as an integer
